preqs: Students must have passed MGW2430 or MGG2430 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB2430, MGG2430, MGW2430} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC3430, MGF3430, MGW3430}

description: Introduction to the major differences between domestic and IHRM; cultural, social and ethical issues for IHRM; IHRM planning, policies and procedures; international relations and evaluation of host country environments; recruitment and selection; remuneration; training and compensating expatriates; maintaining the employment relationship within international operations.
